extensionAttribute.description: This Extension Attribute will Identify if the Server App is installed to /Applications/Server.app and if so it will report the status of the Caching Service as either STOPPED or RUNNING.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/sh
if [ /Applications/Server.app ]; then
/bin/echo "<result>$(serveradmin status caching | awk '{print $3}'| sed s/\"//g)</result>"
else /bin/echo "<result>Server App Not Installed</result>"
fi exit
